title: The Ask
name: The Ask
description:
A coalition of progressive student groups gathers in the plaza outside Patterson Office Tower. They are preparing to demand that the University of Kentucky Board of Trustees affiliate the university with the<a href="http://www.workersrights.org"> Workers Rights Consortium</a>, an independent, labor rights monitoring organization that would police UK apparel suppliers. 

The students, knowing the meeting is a closed conference, take the elevator to the 17th floor, exit, and wait for a student worker affiliated with their cause to open the side, 18th floor stairwell. Holding signs, chanting, and making their way to the conference room, the students hope they will be able to take just enough time, a few moments, to show their force and relate their message.
